features: Hygiene Care for Your Intimate Area - Don’t ignore discomfort in your lady parts; the glycerin-free vaginal wash from Kushae ensures a healthy and balanced sensitive area. This gentle and natural feminine wash will take care of your cleansing needs.

Made from Natural Ingredients - Our foaming wash contains a natural, botanical feminine pH balanced formula that you won’t find in other feminine washes. This vagina wash has no glycerin, parabens, mineral oil, or artificial ingredients, providing gentle care for all ages.

Expertly Formulated for Women - The Kushae feminine wash for women is created by Dr. Barb, a woman OB/GYN, offering the perfect pH balance wash for your intimate area. Feel fresh and confident with gentle and non-toxic natural hygiene products that do not compromise your health.

Long-Lasting Freshness - Experience the long-lasting indulgence. With just one bottle, enjoy two months of nourishing moisture and silky-smooth skin when applied daily. With our feminine wash natural formula. This 8oz natural feminine wash has a nourishing blend of pomegranate extract, French Montmorillonite clay, and aloe vera. It also has a light texture, leaving your skin soft and hydrated.

Gentle Care for All Skin Types - Trusted by gynecologists, our pH balanced feminine wash is ideal for all types of skin, including sensitive skin. You can use these feminine products as a body wash or shaving soap and enjoy a gentle pH wash all over your body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best feminine body wash out
reviews.reviewText: So I absolutely love this product. I use it every single day and it never disappoints. It leaves you feeling fresh for hours on in. I actually got a subscription for this product. I also like the fact that it was made by gynecologists. It also doesn’t have a scent but gets the job done. I definitely recommend adding this product to your routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stuff, however I received it with a defective pump soooo it’s not easy to get soap out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars THIS MAKES ME FEEL SO GOOD
reviews.reviewText: after i use this everyday i feel so clean and healthy and my cat is really ready for anything tbh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I was looking for a product that could make me feel fresh as well as product that would be gentle on my body parts. Kushae was definitely that product not only did it make me feel fresh, but it aided me in being confident down below, and gave that gentle feeling and not abrasive like some other cleansers. I highly recommend this product to anyone who is sensitive down below.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The pump doesn't work!!!!!!!!! Product good.
reviews.reviewText: The pump doesn't work!!!!!!!!! it drives me crazy each time I'm in the shower. I have to jam on the pump to get some product released, usually a tiny bit of runny soap comes out after jamming on the pump 10x, but no foam!!!!! I've bought the product a couple of times, each time hoping it would work know. Last time I screwed off the old pump and put it on the new soap bottle, but still it doesn't work :-(The product is good! I'd love to purchase it again! But it is very pricey. I wished the company would repair their pump mechanism. Or come up with another way like a soap dispenser etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective pump bottle
reviews.reviewText: The foam pump never worked at all, much less work well. Of three educated adults at my house that tried, none of us ever got the bottle to dispense much of anything. I may return it for all the time it wasted. Or I may just dump the cleanser into another container - but the foam pump promise is a let down and the landfill plastic is so wasteful! Frustrating and not worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying and using intimate wash products for about ten years. When I started, I was fortunate to find a cleanser that was created by an OB/GYN - it had no scent, it never irritated my skin, it was PH-balanced, and it was created with mild antiseptic and antifungal properties. That product was sold to a larger company at some point, I believe the formula was changed, and then it ceased to exist. Since then I have tried 4 or 5 different brands - only those that are Ph-balanced, careful to limit harmful ingredients and only those that are fragrance-free. A couple of those actually irritated my skin, and several of them had a scent. I had settled on a brand I really liked, then encountered a problem ordering it - so back to the drawing board and more searching. When I found Kushae brand, I was very hopeful. Here was a brand that was developed by an OB/GYN, contained none of the usual harmful ingredients (sulfates, parabens, DEA, alcohol, fragrances or dyes), and went even further by not including glycerine (I checked out the claim that glycerine can feed yeast and found an article on PubMed that confirmed this). I ordered and tried it, and am very pleased. This is the gentlest feeling intimate wash I have found since my favorite long ago. It has absolutely no scent. I actually like it better than my old favorite because it is produced as a foam, and I am guessing that means less need for it to lather (thereby not relying on detergent agents). Thank you for making this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars PUMP SUCKS please fix it
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd consecutive bottle that doesn't work because of the pump. THAT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE. It will not foam and just squirts fluid even after running the pump under water like instructed. I love this brand. Great for my skin but will have to switch if you don't fix the problem,. The first time I thought it was a fluke but now I can see somethings going on. I've been using this for about a year and the last couple months is when I noticed the constant new issue with the pump. Something is going on while manufacturing the product.
